    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Application
    Application class for entry point of the program.
    Armor
    The Armor is a child of Treasure model.
    BattleEvent
    The BattleEvent class implements the Event interface.
    Cell
    The Cell class is responsible for holding game board coordinates.
    DataFileHandler
    The DataFileHandler class is responsible for handling the reading and writing of game instances from data files.
    Event
    The Event interface defines the methods, that need to be implemented by the concrete implementations.
    FileHandler
    The FileHandler interface defines the methods, that can be accessed from the concrete handler implementations.
    Gameboard
    The Gameboard class is responsible for tracking player, monster and treasure position.
    GameboardGenerator
    The GameboardGenerator class is responsible generating game boards.
    GameProcessor
    The GameProcessor class is responsible for playing out the game logic.
    InputHandler
    The InputHandler Class is responsible for handling the input, provided by the user.
    Level
    The Level class is responsible for containing current level parameters and calculating next level parameters.
    Monster
    The Monster class represent the monsters, that are fought during the BattleEvent.
    Person
    The Person is a child of Player model.
    Player
    This Player class is responsible for implementing base functionality for all player types.
    PlayerLevelUpEvent
    The PlayerLevelUpEvent class implements the Event interface.
    RandomLevelGenerator
    The RandomLevelGenerator class is responsible for creating a random level, that will be used for custom games.
    RoundingCalculator
    The RoundingCalculator class is used for rounding decimal values.
    Spell
    The Spell is a child of Treasure model.
    Treasure
    This Treasure class is responsible for implementing base functionality for all treasure types.
    TreasureEvent
    The TreasureEvent class implements the Event interface.
    TreasureListGenerator
    The TreasureListGenerator class implements the static function for generating treasure, corresponding to level needs.
    TreasureType
    This TreasureType enum represent the treasure types.
    Warrior
    The Warrior is a child of Player model.
    Weapon
    The Weapon is a child of Treasure model.
    Wizard
    The Wizard is a child of Player model.
